name: PLONKS
description:
Controls

  • Left click to attack, if an option is selected, to place a construction. Also, if used Left Click with a plank selected on a placed plank, it will be refunded.
  • E to open construction menu, click on an option to select it.
  • WASD to move.
  • Space to jump.
  • Escape/Enter to enter the pause menu.
  • F to skip level timer.
